note.p: Gardener and solicitor. Son of Adam Fitch. Emigrated to New Zealand.
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/1353/77/54)
New South Wales, Australia, index to deceased estate files, 1859–1958 (Ancestry.com, accessed 26 April 2018)
New Zealand, electoral rolls, 1853–1981 (Ancestry.com, accessed 16 July 2018)
